name: Pesha
appearance: Crown of white hair, eyes like smoke, faint moth-bites on her wrists and sleeves perfumed with wax and herbs.
character: Warm with sly humor; keeps other people's memories safer than her own.
talents: deciphers a person's scent-trail of mood
calms angry rooms with ritual cadence
dreams: train three successors before winter's end
weave a citywide grief rite worthy of the Red Flood
broker a one-season truce between Wardens and Compact
secrets: guards a living star-chart that redraws itself when unobserved
once opened a hidden door in the House of Quiet Wings and will not say how
trades a dream each month with Abbess Rinna Sel
